Entries.breakUp: Ah... the wilted bouquet. A sight I'd hoped to never see...$s#$b#I suppose there are other horizons to set my eyes upon, and other friends to find...$s
Entries.fall_Thu: Oh dear! A tiny crab appears to have made his home in my shirt pocket.$8#$e#That's the trouble with living on the beach.
Entries.fall_Fri10: @, when you're around... I feel unusually creative.$l#$e#I know... strange, but it's true.
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: #$b#...!!! Wait, wait, I have something prepared for this!$8#$b#%Elliott withdraws a worn scrap of paper from his pocket.#$b#*ahem*$h#$b#O, how I labor to describe in idiom... A bond of friendship true, forged in iridium...$h#$b#I pledge my life to you, and you may think it twee... But I will cherish every hour spent with thee.$h#$b#That you would ask for us to be {{RelationshipLabel}}... I admit it's a hope I've nurtured for some time.$l#$b#In the valley, we celebrate pacts like this the same way as weddings. I'll set everything up. We'll have the commitment ceremony in 3 days, okay?
Entries.NPC.cs.3962: I love the tradition of bouquet-gifting. The marriage of natural beauty with human sentiment is artistically stimulating.$h#$b#And... on a personal level, I'm deeply touched. I'd absolutely like us be closer friends.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: These flowers... They signify that you want to deepen our friendship, yes? I feel the same way.$l#$e#...Would you mind if I drew literary inspiration from this moment? The emotions in play are a good fit for a scene I'm working on.
Entries.NPC.cs.3985: I heard you gave {0} a gift today.#$e#I'm glad you're maintaining your friendships outside our household. My own self-isolation was often stifling.
Entries.NPC.cs.4001: When I last visited my former home by the sea, that strange fruit washed ashore at my feet... #$b#If you'll bear with me, I've composed a poem to accompany it.#$b#*ahem* 'To @, my cherished companion.'#$b#I traveled to this land to grow a rose, whose seed slept in the very soil of me. A perfect isolation I'd impose; I'd nurture it alone beside the sea.#$b#The seaside had the sun, and I the soil; I'd thought a rose should need no more to thrive. I never realized that, for all my toil, mere saltwater could not keep it alive.#$b#The seed lay buried and refused to grow, until you came to me amidst the gloom... #$b#Your heart a spring, from which the waterflow... poured into me, until my seedling bloomed.$l#$b#Put simply, @, I love you. I hope my gift inspires you in your work, as you've so often inspired mine.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4425: Life is certainly different since we've been {{RelationshipLabel}}...$s

Entries.fall_Tue8: @, I was just thinking about you.#$e#Maybe you sensed it.$h#$e#So! Tell me about your day.
Entries.winter_Tue10: @, I had a feeling that you would show up.#$e#Perhaps we're connected by an other-worldly thread.$h

Entries.NPC.cs.4442: I feel ill this morning...I think it's my nerves about the adoption paperwork. I hope I filled it out correctly.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4446: I just feel like sleeping today. I was up late writing out my fears surrounding parenthood, as a form of catharsis...$s#$b#I hope the adoption agency gets back to us soon.$7
Entries.NPC.cs.4443: I'm tired... could you make your own breakfast?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4444: My dearest friend... There's no one I'd rather raise a child with than you.$l#$e#Do you think I should write a short story about a writer who adopts a baby? ...No, too obvious.$s

Entries.Elliott0: The farm will be such a lovely place to write. I'm really looking forward to this.$h#$e#We're going to make a great pair.
Entries.Elliott1: This is going to be such an adventure! I'm really excited. Aren't you?$h#$e#We can use my cottage as a beach house.

Entries.NPC.cs.3965: Surely we already had this conversation? Or was that just a scene I wrote so vividly that it seemed to come to life...$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: I know I'm a somewhat recent transplant to the valley, but I understood the tradition to be the gifting of a single pendant. Why are you offering me another?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3967: The pendant I already wear is a symbol of everything we mean to each other. The one you're offering me is just a shell.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3968: No thank you, my friend. Wearing two pendants would be like rhyming a word with itself.

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Elliott: My friend, of course I'd love to see a movie with you! I'll meet you at the theater.

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Elliott: Heh... it just dawned on me...$h#$b#We've reached the summit, but not just physically... metaphorically as well.#$b#How poetic!$h

Entries.Elliott_spouse: You don't need to get me anything. Your friendship is the greatest gift of all.$l
I enjoy seeing you so relaxed, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.$h

Entries.Rainy_Night_2: My skill with words is unmatched, yet I can't properly describe your constitution and resolve.#$b#It astounds me that you can withstand hours outdoors in the pouring rain.
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're {{RelationshipLabel}}. The solitary life wasn't particularly healthy for me.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: From the brightest winter star, to the shimmer of an iridium vein... nothing can compare with your mesmerizing spirit.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: O, lonesome hours awaiting thee... But when my friend comes home to me, my heart, torn by the dread of night, is purified with golden light.#$e#Poetry is the only way I can begin to describe my fondness for you.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: My dearest friend... I wouldn't trade you for 100 iridium bars.#$e#Nor 1000...#$e#Not even 10,000 bars, no.$7#$e#...$7#$e#No, not even 100,000 bars!$a#$e#...$s#$e#Wa... one million bars of pure iridium...? Don't make me do this...$8
Entries.Outdoor_4: I drank too much coffee... my mouth feels about as dry as the Calico Desert.$s
Entries.Good_0: @... I'm so proud of all your hard work. I'm very lucky to be part of your life.$l
Entries.Good_1: I made a whole secret book of poems expressing my affection for you.$l
Entries.fall_26: Would you still respect me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a man has primitive urges...
Entries.winter_28: Happy new year's eve, my dearest friend. Please accept this to celebrate. [348]

Entries.Good_2: I came to the valley to find the ivory tower from which my talents could reign supreme. But what I really found was a dungeon of loneliness. You saved me from that.

Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I think I'll remain indoors today, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. The rain does my hair an injustice.
Entries.patio_Elliott: Ah, what a lovely day to read a book... don't you think, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}?
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Good evening. Did you have a productive day, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}?
Entries.spring_23: I look forward to dancing with you tomorrow, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.
Entries.Good_3: You're looking chic today, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. How to describe your attire... Sumptuous, yet tasteful.#$b#I suppose when I next see it, it will be covered in mud... Well, there is beauty in ephemerality, too.$s
Entries.winter_7: I'm a little out of practice, but I plan on entering the fishing contest tomorrow! You've got some stiff competition, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.

Entries.Rainy_Night_1: You're ice cold! Let me get you a blanket.$8

Entries.Outdoor_Elliott: Today, I'm going to continue writing my new novel. What better place than our wonderful farm?#$e#This is perfect.$h

Entries.Indoor_Night_Elliott: #$c .5#When you come home after a day of hard work, it feels as if you carry the majesty of the outdoors with you.$h#$e#You look tense. Why don't I brew you a cup of spice tea?

Entries.Event.cs.1629: Yes... could I refuse my dearest friend? We'll dance from now 'til springtime's end.$h#$b#That is, until the end of the festival... I confess my lifestyle lends me more stamina for rhymes than rhythms.$s

Entries.elliottLetter1: @, my friend,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... they either seem in a mad hurry, or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... my stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Love, Elliott^^P.S. I hope you had a peaceful night, and weren't too scared all alone in that big house! %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%[#]Letter From Elliott
Entries.elliottLetter2: My dear @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the book to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^^I miss you very much. Remember to eat well! Oh, and don't forget the leftover crab cakes I put in the fridge...^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%[#]Letter From Elliott 2
Entries.elliottLetter3: Cherished @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your devoted friend, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon. Hope you enjoyed the crab cakes.^^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%[#]Letter From Elliott 3
Entries.elliottLetter4: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've travelled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^With you, in Valley dear's embrace:^Our little home beside the pond^^-Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%[#]Letter From Elliott 4
Entries.elliottLetter5: My dear @,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and see what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning the farm... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace ablaze with precious ore, and our little kitchen with the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg. There's a lot to enjoy!^^Just don't stay out too late in the mines, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. It's dangerous in there! If you must go... bring plenty of food.^^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%[#]Letter From Elliott 5
Entries.elliottLetter6: Dearest @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to the comfort of our little house, the satisfying farm work, a home-cooked meal, and most of all, cozying up by the fire with you.^^See you soon!^-Love, Elliott %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%[#]Letter From Elliott 6

I would've finished it either way... but it wouldn't have been the same book.#$b#I told you once that I came here to be alone, so I could write free of all outside influences and distractions.$7#$b#I thought my story lived fully-formed within me, and I only had to let it spring forth in its purest form.$7#$b#But as I grew closer to you, and began to truly feel like a part of this community, I realized... Well, that stories don't work that way.$s#$b#Stories are about people. They're driven by the conflicts and connections between people... which emerge from the diversity of the human experience.#$b#The rich interplay of people who want different things, who've lived different lives, all crashing up against each other like waves on rocks...#$b#I was arrogant to think I could hold all of that within myself. I'm only one person. There were too many gaps for my imagination alone to fill.$s#$b#So it wasn't until my ivory tower was breached... until I started drawing inspiration from those around me... that my characters began to take life on the page.$7#$b#Oh, @... What kind of solipsistic drivel might I have produced, had I never opened myself to other perspectives?$s"/emote Elliott 28/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/speak Elliott "And, well... I mentioned that stories are also about the connections between people... That's true of my life's story, too.#$b#@... You've become more important to me than I know how to express.$l#$b#You... you may have seen shades of that in the book... The unshakeable bond between the lead character, and his cherished friend and companion...$l"/emote farmer 32/pause 150/speak Elliott "I want to tell you how much your friendship means to me... How much brighter my days are when you feature in them... How much I still want to learn from you..."/pause 1000/emote Elliott 40/pause 500/speak Elliott "But for once, I'm at a loss for words.$s#$b#@, may I... hug you?$l"/playMusic elliottPiano/pause 2500/showFrame Elliott 35/screenFlash 1/warp Elliott 26 20/positionOffset Elliott 14 8/positionOffset farmer -24 16/faceDirection farmer 1 true/showFrame 101/pause 4500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Elliott "We'd better head back before the southern wind picks up."/pause 1400/speak Elliott "Look at the valley from here... Entries.summer_Mon10: I can't help but picture you whenever I sit down to write.$l#$b#Would it be too sentimental to describe you as my muse?$h
Entries.fall_Mon10: Hello, @. I must admit I was hoping I'd see you today.$l#$e#Thank you for coming by.$h
Entries.fall_Thu4: Oh dear! A tiny crab appears to have made his home in my shirt pocket.$8#$e#That's the trouble with living on the beach.

Entries.fall_Thu4: Oh dear! A tiny crab appears to have made his home in my shirt pocket.$8#$e#That's the trouble with living on the beach.
Entries.Mon10: When you're around, @, the feelings in my heart can only be called poetry without words.#$e#I hope all is well with you.$h
Entries.Tue10: In my life, I've spent so much time alone, but I think I may be ready for a change to that.
Entries.Thu10: I've tried my hand at some sonnets lately.#$e#Oh! I've written nothing worth another's attention.#$e#Perhaps another time.
Entries.summer_Thu10: I think of how much I was bullied and outcast as a child. To find someone like you, I feel luckier than I ever thought I'd be.$h
Entries.summer_Sun10: I can often see pieces of myself in the characters I create. But lately, I've written some vignettes that resemble you more than me.
Entries.winter_Fri10: I can often see pieces of myself in the characters I create. But lately, I've written some vignettes that resemble you more than me.

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: #$c .5#How on earth did I manage to rough it out in that old shack? Even now, it already feels like a memory out of someone else's life.#I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're {{RelationshipLabel}}. The solitary life wasn't particularly healthy for me.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: From the brightest winter star, to the shimmer of an iridium vein... nothing can compare with your mesmerizing spirit.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: My dearest friend... I wouldn't trade you for 100 iridium bars.#$e#Nor 1000...#$e#Not even 10,000 bars, no.$7#$e#...$7#$e#No, not even 100,000 bars!$a#$e#...$s#$e#Wa... one million bars of pure iridium...? Don't make me do this...$8
Entries.Good_0: @... I'm so proud of all your hard work. I'm very lucky to be part of your life.$l
Entries.Good_1: I made a whole secret book of poems expressing my affection for you.$l
Entries.fall_26: Would you still respect me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a man has primitive urges...
Entries.winter_28: Happy new year's eve, my dearest friend. Please accept this to celebrate. [348]
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: #$c .5#Today is going to be a fantastic day... I can feel it! I get this special feeling in my nose...$h#A sheen of silky sun in window's glare... reminds me how I know I've found my home, wherein your gleaming gaze invites to share... a moment in the sun to call our own.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: #$c .5#O, lonesome hours awaiting thee... But when my friend comes home to me, my heart... torn by the dread of night, is purified with golden light.#A darkened, starry sky will blanket us, and captivate us with celestial charm. Beneath that shroud you'll find your peace, in trust that I will shelter you from any harm.#$e#Poetry is the only way I can begin to describe my fondness for you.$l
Entries.Outdoor_4: #$c .5#Good morning. Might I steal a hug from my treasured friend?$l#I drank too much coffee... my mouth feels about as dry as the Calico Desert.$s

Entries.Good_2: I came to the valley to find the ivory tower from which my talents could reign supreme. But what I really found was a dungeon of loneliness. You saved me from that.

Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Good evening. Did you have a productive day, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}?
Entries.spring_23: I look forward to dancing with you tomorrow, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.
Entries.Good_3: You're looking chic today, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. How to describe your attire... Sumptuous, yet tasteful.#$b#I suppose when I next see it, it will be covered in mud... Well, there is beauty in ephemerality, too.$s
Entries.winter_7: I'm a little out of practice, but I plan on entering the fishing contest tomorrow! You've got some stiff competition, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: #$c .5#I think I'll remain indoors today, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. The rain does my hair an injustice..#Goodness! I'm in constant admiration at how you boldly venture outside on these days, yet it never dampens your spirit.
Entries.patio_Elliott: #$c .5#Ah... What a lovely day to read a book, don't you think?#Feel free to join me if you're taking a break, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: #$c .5#Have you been out in the rain all day? My skill with words is unmatched, yet I can't properly describe your constitution and resolve.#Ah, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}, I was just thinking about you. Welcome home.$h
Entries.winter_21: I've always thought, as long as speaking is one of the most fundamentally human things we do, I might as well take some pride in it.$h#$e#I say I should speak mellifluously, even if others may find it strange.#$b#Yet, you know me well, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}: It would be strange if I didn't speak in my most authentic voice, would it not?
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: #$c .5#I've had this recurring nightmare that you gave me a buzz cut... You wouldn't ever do that to me, would you?$s#{{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}, what do you think we should do for dinner tonight? It's your pick.#$e#I trust you.

Entries.Elliott_spouse: I've prepared a poem for this evening. It's a bit long, but speak to me again if you'd like to hear it.#$e#The Midnight Ocean#$b#When lost in life as though I were asleep, / I fell into the midnight ocean deep, / The tossing waves attacking me to keep.#$b#"Prepost'rous, I can't die," thought I with pride, / For though it swept my body side to side, / "I only need a luminescent guide."#$b#Perhaps a cracking lightning bolt could blind, / Flash up a shoreline, etch into my mind / A simple haven, quite an easy find.#$b#Perhaps a royal galleon, blazing hope -- / The crew would spy me through a telescope, / And with some brilliant fanfare, offer rope.#$b#But nothing regal answered my proud cry: / Instead, some glowing jellyfish came nigh, / These eerie blooms no brighter than a sigh.#$b#And beckoned by this ghostly company, / I joined their flow, my strength returning free, / For drawn along to refuge, I did see#$b#The saving light strikes not in gaudy show / But rather glints in softest somber glow.#e#Thank you for indulging me, my friend.$h

none/-100 -100/farmer 19 10 2 Marlon 18 10 3/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message "Open your eyes, {2}."/viewport 19 10 true/pause 1500/speak Marlon "Hello there, @. I'm glad you managed to wake. For a moment, I was worried that your injury may have been worse than it looked."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Marlon "As per my routine, I was culling the population of slimes in the mines when all of a sudden, I noticed that they were amassing in one place.#$b#I followed their tracks and found you, face-down on the ground and out cold. You seem to have been knocked out, although thankfully, the responsible injury seems minor."/pause 500/speak Marlon "At any rate, it is best you return home. You may have gotten away with only a mild injury, but you shouldn't be negligent of your exhaustion."/faceDirection Marlon 2/pause 500/speak Marlon "I should also inform you that, as per Guild policy, I will be sending a brief memo of today's events to your next of kin. Your {{SocialMenuLabel}}, in this case.#$b#I shall not disclose anything more than general information, do not worry. Simply focus on regaining your strength.#$b# And of course, continue the good work you're doing once you're recovered. You're truly an invaluable member of the Guild."/emote farmer 16/pause 500/textAboveHead Marlon "Farewell."/move Marlon 0 4 0/warp Marlon -100 -100/pause 1500/message "I do feel exhausted, but not terribly injured, as he said."/message "Hopefully, that will be enough to reassure Elliott, wherever he is now..."/mail ElliottReactionMine/minedeath/end

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3 Elliott 22 8 2/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message "...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Easy, now... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Hello @, I'm glad you're finally awake.#$b#Someone brought you back here unconscious and badly injured. Entries.ElliottReactionHospital: Dearest @,^^Dr. Harvey contacted me yesterday to ask for surgical consent on your behalf while you were unresponsive, and has since updated me on your condition. I was ready to cancel my tour and return home at once, although he assured me that you would be fine.^{{TermofEndearment}}, I was truly frightened for you, but all I can do from so far away is ask you to be careful.^I miss you and wish I could have been with you when you needed me the most.^^All my love, your devoted {{SocialMenuLabel}} Elliott.[#]A Very Worried {{SocialMenuLabel}}
Entries.ElliottReactionMine: Dear @,^^Imagine my surprise when I received a letter from Marlon yesterday! He informed me that you'd collapsed in the mines, although I was relieved to know that your injuries were only minor.^Still, I wish I had been able to be by your side, even for such a tiny mishap. I will have a lot of doting to catch up on once I return home.^^Be safe, and I shall see you soon, my muse.^-Love, Elliott[#]A Worried {{SocialMenuLabel}}

Entries.funLeave_Elliott: #$c .5#{{TermofEndearment}}, how are you? Did you sleep well?#I wrote some more poetry this morning. I'll share it with you sometime.$h#$e#$c .5#We appear to be running low on groceries. I'll stop by Pierre's later today.#I know Mondays can get busy, so don't overwork yourself, my friend.
Entries.funReturn_Elliott: #$c .5#Hey... I'm very proud of everything you've done today. You've worked hard.#My day was nothing special, my friend.#$e#$c .7#Let's continue the book I was reading for you before bed.#Tonight marks the thrilling conclusion of our book! I hope you're just as excited as I am.$h

Entries.funLeave_Elliott: #$c .5#Good morning. It is an amazing feeling, no longer waking to an empty house.#Hello, @. Waking up to silence instead of seagulls is an absolute wonder, is it not?#$e#This life with you... It is truly a life anyone would seek.$h#$b#Stay safe today. I love you, my dearest friend.$l
Entries.funReturn_Elliott: #$c .5#Welcome back. You must be starving. Don't worry, I have just the thing for you. Enjoy.[213 212 244 198 214]#You look tired, @. Do you need me to bring you anything?$h#$e#You should get some rest soon.

Entries.funLeave_Elliott: #$c .5#What are you up to today, my muse? I think I've read enough literature this week.#I made us some breakfast, dearest @. Here you are.[194 195 211 201 241]#$e#$c .5#I'll be down at the beach today. It's always nice to see the ocean again.#I'll be using this day to relax. Make sure you do the same sometime.
Entries.funReturn_Elliott: #$c .5#Sorry I'm home late. But I bought some fresh fish from Willy today, I'll cook you dinner sometime to make up for it.#Oh! You frightened me, @. I'm surprised you're still up at this hour.$8#$e#Would you like to continue our book tonight? Is that why you were waiting for me?

Entries.funLeave_Elliott: #$c .5#Good morning. It's time for another day.$h#Ah, you're awake. Did you sleep well?$h#$e#$c .5#The library is usually unoccupied on Sundays so that's where I'll be today.#I'll be out in town today. You know where to find me, my friend.
Entries.funReturn_Elliott: #$c .5#I'm just sipping on some water. I didn't drink much at the saloon but I'd prefer not to take any chances.#@! You have an absolutely inspiring energy about you tonight!$h#$e#Are you ready to get some rest? Or do you still need to attend to the farm?#$b#If so, be careful, it's hard to see out in the dark.$h

Entries.marriage_bus2: "Love one another, but make not a bond of love:#$b#Let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls."#$b#By Khalil Gibran... Have a good day, my dearest friend.
Entries.marriage_bus3: "This poem is endless...#$b#the odds against us are endless...#$b#our chances of being alive together statistically nonexistent...#$b#still we have made it.$l"#$b#By Lisel Mueller... Have a good day, my cherished companion.
Entries.marriage_bus6: "You do not have to be good...#$b#You do not have to walk on your knees for a hundred miles through the desert repenting...#$b#You only have to let the soft animal of your body love what it loves."#$b#Have a good day, my muse.
Entries.marriage_bus8: "Dance as though no one is watching you...#$b#Love as though you have never been hurt before...$s#$b#Sing as though no one can hear you...$h#$b#Live as though heaven is here on earth."#$b#Have a good day, my friend.$h
Entries.marriage_bridge2: Have you been working hard, my friend?#$b#Of course you have, why do I even ask?$h
Entries.marriage_beach: The beach is quite relaxing at this hour, don't you think?
Entries.marriage_leah: Leah looked lonely tonight, so I figured I'd catch up with an old friend.$h#$b#I'll be home soon.
Entries.marriage_nm: It's a beautiful night, isn't it?#$b#The sky is truly sight to behold.$h
Entries.marriage_25: There you are, my friend. I wanted to go in together.#$b#There's not much to do when you're early, speaking from experience, of course.$h

Entries.marriage_bridge3: Ah, @! Just as I was starting to get lonely.
Entries.marriage_nmpre2: Yes, don't worry, I haven't forgotten.#$b#There's still some time left before it opens, best to finish any duties you have now.$h#$b#If you are done, then please, join me.

Entries.marriage_bus: Ah, how are you doing, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}?#$b#I write outside once in awhile to get my thoughts flowing.$h
Entries.marriage_bus4: "There is no chance that we will fall apart...#$b#There is no chance. There are no parts."#$b#By June Jordan... Have a good day, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.
Entries.marriage_bus7: "Promise yourself to be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind...#$b#To talk health, happiness, and prosperity to every person you meet...#$b#To make all your friends feel like there is something in them."$h#$b#By Christian Larson... I know you'll always do the right thing, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.
Entries.marriage_beach3: I passed by my old house... It's a shame that such fine construcion is going unused.$s#$b#I wish that man Linus would just accept my offer and live in it.$s#$b#You're right, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Nothing I can do. You did warn me he would refuse.#$b#I'll continue to use it as storage for now.$h
Entries.marriage_nmpre: I wrote a poem about tonight, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Would you like to hear it?#$b#'For the glimmering nights and the whimpering lights...$h#$b#I shall not weep, the lights that seek no sleep.'$a#$b#That is all.
Entries.marriage_13: Good luck on the hunt, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. I'll be cheering you on.$h#$b#I'll come in after you.
Entries.marriage_16: I've seen what you've been up to. Your display is going to be marvelous, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.$h
